name: Cylor vs. the Evil Mutant Cats
name_original: Cylor vs. the Evil Mutant Cats
description:
Enter the surreal, bouncy world of Cylor! Battle bizarre cat creatures as you traverse the landscape. Collect strange gemstones and unlock gates to explore new areas. Find hidden upgrades to increase your firepower and send those cats back to the litter!!!

Originally created as a prototype in 2012, Cylor was later finished in January of 2013 (and further updated in October of 2013) as a short “mini-Metroidvania" platformer.

Credits

  • Joe Pierce (@LBUncleJoe): design, art, additional programming
  • Nate Wiesel (@NateWiesel): design, programming, art, music
  • Hinchy (@ItsHinchy): porting and additional programming
  • Brittany Mezzo (@scarfmezzo): testing, additional art
